scripts.clean: rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm run updatedeps
scripts.build:angular: cd angular/src && yarn --force && ng cache clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:angular && npm run copy:package && npm run copy:angular
scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish ./build --access public --tag rc
scripts.build:angular:demo: cd angular/demo && yarn --force && ng cache clean && npm run build
scripts.release:angular:demo:dev: npm run updatedeps && npm run build:angular:demo && cd angular/demo && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.release:angular:demo:prod: npm run updatedeps && npm run build:angular:demo && cd angular/demo && npm run deploy:prod
